name: Rishita Srivastava
college: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University

full_output.summary: As an aspiring fullstack web and app developer, proficient in MERN stack, Next.js, and React Native, along with a solid foundation in C++ and JavaScript, I bring hands-on experience and a strong problem-solving aptitude to deliver high-quality software products with precision.

education.school: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University

projects.name: ImaginAI - AI-based SaaS platform
projects.description: An AI powered image processing platform that consolidates advanced image processing tools, secure payment integration, and robust search capabilities, empowering users to effortlessly enhance, manipulate, and manage visual content.

projects.name: ApnaSafar - Hotel Booking Website
projects.description: It simplifies hotel booking with its intuitive interface and comprehensive listings. It aggregates offerings from various hotels and resorts, allowing users to seamlessly search, compare, and reserve accommodations.

projects.name: UpDriven - Carpooling platform
projects.description: It facilitates eco-friendly transportation by connecting drivers and passengers for shared rides. Say goodbye to traffic congestion and carbon emissions with this innovative carpooling solution.

projects.name: E-Shoppers - E-Commerce store
projects.description: It offers a seamless online shopping experience, featuring a diverse range of products and secure transaction capabilities. From electronics to fashion, customers can explore and purchase items with confidence.

experiences.description: Worked with a team of four developers to build the official website of Big Data Center Of Excellence, streamlining the current processes. Planned and organized more than six events, including workshops, hackathons, and coding contests for college students, with an average of 250 participants per event.

Developed an Assessment Platform serving over 500 students, utilizing socket programming for dynamic leaderboards, resulting in a 25% increase in user engagement. Implemented load balancing strategies to ensure 90% uptime, even during peak usage, providing a reliable exam experience.

full_output.name: Rishita Srivastava
achievements_and_awards: Achieved a Top 5 position in the ByteVerse Hackathon hosted by NIT Patna in 2023.
Mentored and organized technical events, contributing to the growth and development of our college.
